flawed_nl_solution:
The school bought 10 x 20 = <<10*20=200>>200 bottled water.
There were 200 - 70 = <<200-70=310>>310 bottled water left after the first game.
So, there were 310 - 20 = <<310-20=290>>290 bottled water used during the second game.
#### 290

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 130, not 310. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
